attributes.additional_details:
Introduce an animal tax - 4 pound a month to be taken out of wages

This is a good idea because we should be looking after our animals which sadly not many people do, animals are found in the world that have been hurt beyond anything humans would ever accept, if a human received the same treatment as some animals it would be classed as torture, so this idea is to help the charities that help the animals that need it. How many of you have watched a video of an animal that has been rescued and had that video bring a tear to your eye.
